events.name: Cleveland Guardians at Kansas City Royals

headlines.description: — The only big mistake that Cleveland rookie Steven Kwan has made during his first four big league games came in left field, where he was trying to rush a catch-and-throw to the plate and had a flyball bounce off the heel of his glove.
headlines.shortLinkText: Remarkable rookie Kwan delivers again, Guardians beat Royals

video.headline: Steven Kwan breaks game open with bases-clearing triple

tracking.trackingName: MLB_One-Play (Steven Kwan breaks game open with bases-clearing triple) 2022/4/11 ESHEET
